Property.name: disable_cutscenes
Property.HelpText: Mini-Cutscenes are the unskippable cutscenes that play at the beginning of certain levels such as Green Forest, Pumpkin Hill, and Egg Quarters to name a few. When this value is enabled, these cutscenes will not play. Uncheck this to restore the mini-cutscenes.

Property.name: hero_rush
Property.HelpText: Replaces the "Hero Side" Boss Rush mode with a custom sequence of your choosing

Property.name: dark_rush
Property.HelpText: Replaces the "Dark Side" Boss Rush mode with a custom sequence of your choosing

Property.name: all_rush
Property.HelpText: Replaces the "All" Boss Rush mode with a custom sequence of your choosing
